title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 47 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 47 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: O clap your hands, all ye people; shout unto God with the voice of triumph.
lineList.cn: （可拉后裔的诗，交与伶长）万民哪，你们都要拍掌。要用夸胜的声音向神呼喊。

lineList.en: For the LORD most high is terrible; he is a great King over all the earth.
lineList.cn: 因为耶和华至高者是可畏的。他是治理全地的大君王。

lineList.en: He shall subdue the people under us, and the nations under our feet.
lineList.cn: 他叫万民服在我们以下，又叫列邦服在我们脚下。

lineList.en: He shall choose our inheritance for us, the excellency of Jacob whom he loved. Selah.
lineList.cn: 他为我们选择产业，就是他所爱之雅各的荣耀。（细拉）。

lineList.en: God is gone up with a shout, the LORD with the sound of a trumpet.
lineList.cn: 神上升，有喊声相送。耶和华上升，有角声相送。

lineList.en: Sing praises to God, sing praises: sing praises unto our King, sing praises.
lineList.cn: 你们要向神歌颂，歌颂，向我们王歌颂，歌颂。

lineList.en: For God is the King of all the earth: sing ye praises with understanding.
lineList.cn: 因为神是全地的王。你们要用悟性歌颂。

lineList.en: God reigneth over the heathen: God sitteth upon the throne of his holiness.
lineList.cn: 神作王治理万国。神坐在他的圣宝座上。

lineList.en: The princes of the people are gathered together, even the people of the God of Abraham: for the shields of the earth belong unto God: he is greatly exalted.
lineList.cn: 列邦的君王聚集，要作亚伯拉罕之神的民。因为世界的盾牌，是属神的。他为至高。
